parameters.name: PaletteViewName
parameters.description: Name of the drawing view to move to the drawing sheet

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: x coordinate where to drop the drawing view

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: y coordinate where to drop the drawing view

parameters.name: Z
parameters.description: z coordinate where to drop the drawing view ; this coordinate is always 0

title: IDrawingDoc.DropDrawingViewFromPalette2
description: Moves the specified drawing view from the View Palette to the current drawing sheet.
signature:
View DropDrawingViewFromPalette2( 
   System.String
PaletteViewName
,
   System.Double
X
,
   System.Double
Y
,
   System.Double
Z
)

parameters.name: PaletteViewName
parameters.description: Name of the drawing view to move to the drawing sheet

parameters.name: X
parameters.description: x coordinate where to drop the drawing view

parameters.name: Y
parameters.description: y coordinate where to drop the drawing view

parameters.name: Z
parameters.description: z coordinate where to drop the drawing view ; this coordinate is always 0

remarks: The x, y, and z coordinates are in paper space. Thus, the drawing sheet scale is irrelevant.
